text: Phu thi sraththa thanghlay meux phwk cea deinthang pi nı thang khx ngxallxhˌ k cng hı pracaksʹ chad seiy kxn læa cng xya klaw kæ phu thi klaw sla m kæ phwk cea wa than michı pen phu sraththa doy sæwngha sing xanwy prayochn chawkhraw hæng chiwit khwam pen xyu nı lok ni tæ n thi xallxhˌ nan mi paccay yangchiph xan makmay nı thanxng deiywkan nan phwk cea k khey pen ma kxn læ wxallxhˌ di thrng pordpran kæ phwk cea dangnan phwk cea cng hı pracaksʹ seiy kxn thæ cring xallxhˌ nan thrng rxbru xyang thithwn nı sing thi phwk cea kratha kan xyu
